text:
The Board of Supervisors hereby declares and finds that the City should acquire uniforms and equipment items to be furnished as needed to the employees of the Police, Fire, Sheriff's, and Public Transportation departments. The furnishing of uniforms and equipment items by the City to employees is neither intended to constitute additional compensation nor to be considered a part of the rate of pay for such employees. 
(Added by Ord. 156-99, File No. 990743, App. 6/2/99)

heading.catch_text: FINDING: UNIFORMS SHOULD BE SUPPLIED AND OWNED BY CITY.
